mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xx_order ( create_date, modify_date, version, address, amount, amount_paid, area_name, complete_date, consignee, coupon_discount, exchange_point, expire, fee, freight, invoice_content, invoice_title, is_allocated_stock, is_exchange_point, is_use_coupon_code, lock_expire, lock_key, memo, offset_amount, payment_method_name, payment_method_type, phone, price, promotion_discount, promotion_names, quantity, refund_amount, returned_quantity, reward_point, shipped_quantity, shipping_method_name, sn, STATUS, tax, type, weight, zip_code, area, coupon_code, member, payment_method, shipping_method ) VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), 1, #{address}, #{amount}, #{amountPaid}, #{areaName}, NOW(), #{consignee}, #{couponDiscount}, #{exchangePoint}, #{expire}, #{fee}, #{freight}, #{invoiceContent}, #{invoiceTitle}, #{isAllocatedStock}, #{isExchangePoint}, #{isUseCouponCode}, #{lockExpire}, #{lockKey}, #{memo}, #{offsetAmount}, #{paymentMethodName}, #{paymentMethodType}, #{phone}, #{price}, #{promotionDiscount}, #{promotionNames}, #{quantity}, #{refundAmount}, #{returnedQuantity}, #{rewardPoint}, #{shippedQuantity}, #{shippingMethodName}, #{sn}, #{status}, #{tax}, #{type}, #{weight}, #{zipCode}, #{area}, #{couponCode}, #{member}, #{paymentMethod}, #{shippingMethod} )
